post_content:
All set, thanks!

Only two more T206 Red Sox players left to complete my team set. Unfortunately one of them is Cicotte (the other being Arellanes). If anyone is looking to sell either card, especially Cicotte, please let me know. My absolute max budget is $250 shipped. SGC preferred but PSA works as well. PPFF if you have references.Thanks!!

Here is a Cicotte that I have available.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Bill

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=611970&d=1709144083[/IMG]
Ended up picking one up this morning, I should have waited a few more hours and then checked back here. Thanks for the offer though I appreciate.
